<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/soul-bomb.png} tip={Soul Bomb}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/radiant-peacock.png} tip={Radiant Peacock}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/haku-reborn.png} tip={Haku Reborn}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/exorcists-charm.png} tip={Exorcist's Charm}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-2.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting 2}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-brother.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Brother}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-charm.png} tip={Shikigami Charm}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/mana-balance.png} tip={Mana Balance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/lifeblood-ritual.png} tip={Lifeblood Ritual}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/kishin-shoukan.png} tip={Kishin Shoukan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/spirit-path.png} tip={Spirit Path}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/blossom-barrier.png} tip={Blossom Barrier}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/yosuzume.png} tip={Yosuzume}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-3.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting 3}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-lieutenant.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Lieutenant}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/tengu-strike.png} tip={Tengu Strike}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/haku-perfected.png} tip={Haku Perfected}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/kasen.png} tip={Kasen}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/nightghost-guide.png} tip={Nightghost Guide}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-4.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting 4}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/akatsuki-warrior.png} tip={Akatsuki Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/bellflower-barrier.png} tip={Bellflower Barrier}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/nine-tailed-fury.png} tip={Nine-Tailed Fury}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/orochi-unbound.png} tip={Orochi Unbound}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-boss.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Boss}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/falling-sakura.png} tip={Falling Sakura}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-doppelganger.png} tip={Shikigami Doppelganger}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/binding-tempest.png} tip={Binding Tempest}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm-extra-strike.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm - Extra Strike}> Vanquisher's Charm - Extra Strike_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/bellflower-barrier-boss-rush.png} tip={Bellflower Barrier - Boss Rush}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/blossom-barrier-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Blossom Barrier - Cooldown Cutter}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/bellflower-barrier-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Bellflower Barrier - Cooldown Cutter}> Bellflower Barrier - Boss Rush, Cooldown Cutter and Persist_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/geomancy-spread.png} tip={Geomancy - Spread}> Geomancy - Spread OR <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm-reinforce.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm - Reinforce}> Vanquisher's Charm - Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-4.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/tengu-strike.png} tip={Tengu Strike (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/kishin-shoukan.png} tip={Kishin Shoukan (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-boss.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Boss (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/exorcists-charm.png} tip={Exorcist's Charm (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/veritable-pandemonium.png} tip={Veritable Pandemonium (Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/yosuzume.png} tip={Yosuzume (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-doppelganger.png} tip={Shikigami Doppelganger (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-4.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-boss.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Boss (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/kishin-shoukan.png} tip={Kishin Shoukan (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/nightghost-guide.png} tip={Nightghost Guide (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-charm.png} tip={Shikigami Charm (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/exorcists-charm.png} tip={Exorcist's Charm (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/tengu-strike.png} tip={Tengu Strike (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/yosuzume.png} tip={Yosuzume (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/orochi-unbound.png} tip={Orochi Unbound (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/falling-sakura.png} tip={Falling Sakura (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/binding-tempest.png} tip={Binding Tempest (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/nine-tailed-fury.png} tip={Nine-Tailed Fury (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-doppelganger.png} tip={Shikigami Doppelganger (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/veritable-pandemonium.png} tip={Veritable Pandemonium (Hyper Skill)}>

extraContent.title: Mana and Haku the Fox Familiar
extraContent.content:
Kanna uses Mana instead of MP to cast skills. Mana regens passively and is not recovered from potions

Kanna's Secondary Weapon is another Fan that is equipped by Kanna's Fox familiar, Haku. The fan that Haku equips is calculated differently than your primary fan based on the skill Haku the Familiar 2 (1st Job)

Lastly, Kanna has a beginner skill called Blessing of the Five Elements that converts MP on equipment into HP. Additionally, Kanna gains increased Magic Attack based on your Max HP

primary.name: Blessing of the Five Elements
primary.shortDesc:
Permanently increases HP by 15%, Damage from enemies: - 20%
+HP while +MP item is equipped
+1 Magic Attack for every 700 HP
[Magic Attack Increase: -]

primary.name: Haku the Familiar
primary.shortDesc: The mystical creature Haku follows you around everywhere. EVERYWHERE.
details: Double-clicking the skill will visually toggle Haku ON/OFF when it is not performing any attacks or buffs

primary.name: Manaflow
primary.shortDesc: When Mana is not full, automatically recovers 50 every 6 seconds until full.\nFan Weapon Mastery: +40%.

primary.name: Return of the Five Planets
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Momijigaoka.\nCooldown 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: Increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/58/Spiritual_Release} title={"Spiritual Release"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Geomancy
primary.shortDesc:
Permanently gain Insight Lv. 30 and increases Knockback Resistance by 30%.
Every 5 sec, Kanna will discover a Mana Vein in the area when one of the skills below is used.
[1st-4th Skills] Shikigami Haunting 3rd Hit
[2nd Skills] Exorcist's Charm, Shikigami Charm
[4th Skill] Falling Sakura
The spiritual energy of nature flows within the Mana Vein, allowing Kanna's Mana to recover even more quickly This effect stacks with MP recovery from other skills. Up to 3 Mana Veins can be active at one time.
primary.desc: Every 5 secs, a Mana Vein will appear when one of the skills below is used. Standing in a Mana Vein increases Kanna's Mana recovery
details: Up to 3 Mana Veins can be active at one time

Skills that trigger Mana Vein:<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting Skills (1st - 4th Job)}> Shikigami Haunting Skills (1st - 4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/exorcists-charm.png} tip={Exorcist's Charm (2nd Job)}> Exorcist's Charm (2nd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/falling-sakura.png} tip={Falling Sakura (4th Job)}> Falling Sakura (4th Job)_>
Also permanently increases Insight trait to Lv. 30 and %Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Haku the Familiar 2
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Speed by 20 and Luck by 30\nHaku draws upon the power of the Fan equipped to the Secondary Slot. 50% of Magic ATT of the Fan in the Secondary Weapon slot will apply to Kanna.\nBoth Potential and Bonus Potential apply.

primary.name: Shikigami Haunting
primary.shortDesc: [1st Hit]: Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Attack Count: 2\n[2nd Hit]: Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Attack Count: 2\n[3rd Hit]: Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Attack Count: 2
primary.desc: Attack forward consecutively up to 3 times

primary.name: Spiritual Enlightenment
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases INT by 40 and Defense by 400.

primary.name: Mana Wrap
primary.shortDesc: [Normal Teleport] Press a directional key and the skill key together to teleport a horizontal distance of 300 or a vertical distance of 400.\n[Mana Vein Teleport] Press the skill key when a Mana Vein is discovered and you'll immediately jump to one of the discovered Mana Veins\n[Random Teleport] Press the skill key in town to teleport to a random location. Mana Cost: 20
primary.desc: Teleport in the direction you are moving using the Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air as well and on ladders
If a <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/geomancy.png} tip={Geomancy (1st Job)}> Mana Vein is active, pressing the Skill Key without any Arrow Keys will teleport you to a Mana Vein
In towns, pressing the Skill Key without any Arrow Keys teleports you to a random location within the map

primary.name: Ghost Yaksha Trainee
primary.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 30, Duration: 30 sec. Summons the Ghost Yaksha Shikigami.
While summoned, the Ghost Yaksha repeatedly attacks up to 6 enemies for 120% damage 4 times.
Use the skill again while the Ghost Yaksha is summoned to instantly dismiss it, pulling in nearby enemies to be hit for 350% damage.
Cooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Summon a ghost minion that repeatedly attacks in an area and pushes enemies back
details: Pressing the Skill Key while summoned will dismiss the minion<bp_When dismissed, enemies are pulled in and damaged_>

primary.name: Shikigami Haunting 2
primary.shortDesc:
[1st Hit]: Damage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 2
[2nd Hit]: Damage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 2
[3rd Hit]: Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 2
[Spirit Warding Charm]: Activation Chance: 40%. Duration: 6 sec, Speed Reduced by 60%, Damage: 105% per sec
details: Increases %Damage and max enemies hit
Now also applies a damaging and slowing debuff

primary.name: Haku Reborn
primary.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 50, Transformation Duration: 300 sec. Cooldown: 5 sec
Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
[Haku's Gift]: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores 50% of max HP. (Cooldown: 120 sec)
[Foxfire]: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for 30 sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire absorbs the damage instead, then attacks back by exploding for 800% damage. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
[Breath of the Unseen]: Kanna's final damage increased by 1% for each party member. (Always Applied)
[Haku's Blessing]: Increases the damage of party members by 10%.
primary.desc: Transform Haku into a human form who will provide you buffs
details: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/hakus-gift.png} tip={Haku Reborn - Haku's Gift (2nd Job)}> [Haku's Gift]: When Kanna is below 90%, Haku will restore some %HP

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/foxfire.png} tip={Haku Reborn - Foxfire (2nd Job)}> [Foxfire]: Summon a barrier of foxfire, when Kanna is hit, the foxfire will reduce damage taken and explode dealing damage

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/breath-of-the-unseen.png} tip={Haku Reborn - Breath of the Unseen (2nd Job)}> [Breath of the Unseen]: Kanna's %Final Damage is increased for each nearby party member
<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/hakus-blessing.png} tip={Haku Reborn - Haku's Blessing (2nd Job)}> [Haku's Blessing]: Applies to party members, increases %Damage

primary.name: Exorcist's Charm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Summons a dark cloud. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 350%, Attack Count: 6, Duration: 3 sec. When enemies come in contact with the cloud, they receive 200% damage every 1 sec for 1 sec.\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Leap upwards and release an explosive cloud
details: Attack leaves a lingering poisonous cloud that damages enemies within it

primary.name: Ghost Yaksha Brother
primary.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 30, Duration: 30 sec. Summons the Ghost Yaksha Shikigami.
While summoned, the Ghost Yaksha repeatedly attacks up to 8 enemies for 150% damage 4 times.
Use the skill again while the Ghost Yaksha is summoned to instantly dismiss it, pulling in nearby enemies to be hit for 350% damage.
Cooldown: 3 sec
details: Increases %Damage and max enemies hit
Replaces <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-trainee.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Trainee (1st Job)}> and can be summoned by using the same Skill Key

primary.name: Shikigami Charm
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 4. Creates a vortex to attack enemies and flings you back.
primary.desc: Leap upwards while damaging enemies

primary.name: Radiant Peacock
primary.shortDesc: Increases the Attack Speed by 2 levels for 240 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Soul Bomb
primary.shortDesc: Hits enemies within a 150-pixel range of the defeated enemy. Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 120%
primary.desc: Enemies defeated by you explode dealing damage to nearby enemies

primary.name: Warding Barrier
primary.shortDesc: [Max Barriers Simultaneously Deployable]: 3\n[Mana Recovery Reduction Per Barrier]: 4
primary.desc: While Barriers are active, you have reduced Mana recovery for each Barrier active
details: Up to 3 Barriers can be placed at one time

Barrier Skills:<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/blossom-barrier.png} tip={Blossom Barrier (3rd Job)}> Blossom Barrier (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/bellflower-barrier.png} tip={Bellflower Barrier (4th Job)}> Bellflower Barrier (4th Job)_>

primary.name: Blossom Barrier
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 20, Duration: 30 sec, Damage Reduction: 40%, HP Recovery: 10, Status Resistance: +30\nCooldown: 100 sec
primary.desc: Within the barrier, party members gain %Damage Reduction, Abnormal Status Resistance, and periodically recover HP
details: When a barrier is placed on top of a <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/geomancy.png} tip={Geomancy (1st Job)}> Mana Vein, the barrier grows bigger and grants increased Mana recovery

primary.name: Shikigami Haunting 3
primary.shortDesc:
[1st Hit]: Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 4
[2nd Hit]: Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 4
[3rd Hit]: Damage: 250%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 4
[Spirit Warding Charm]: Activation Chance: 60%. Duration: 6 sec, Speed Reduced by 75%, Damage: 160% per sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Increases activation chance, %Damage, %Speed Reduced of debuff

primary.name: Yosuzume
primary.shortDesc: Each successful attack by Kanna has a 100% chance to summon Shikigami Charms, depending on the number of mobs hit. Shikigami Charms fly to nearby enemies, dealing 195% damage and leaving a mark that adds 5% to damage received from Kanna's attacks for 5 sec.
primary.desc: Sucessful attacks have a chance to create charms that seek and attack enemies while debuffing them
details: [Debuff]: Receives increased %Damage from Kanna

primary.name: Spirit Path
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +30, Critical Rate: +40%, Critical Damage: +20%, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Lifeblood Ritual
primary.shortDesc: Restores 5% of Max HP for each enemy defeated. When attacking a boss enemy, restores 1% of Max HP every 4 sec.\nPermanently increases Status Resistance by 30%.
primary.desc: Enemies defeated restores some %HP
details: While attacking bosses, also restore some %HP periodically
Additionally, permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance

primary.name: Tengu Strike
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 20. Summons the twin Tengu.\nThe Tengu will venture out as far as 600 to the left and right of Kanna, and attack up to 15 enemies for 400% damage 5 times.\nCooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: Send out two demons on both directions that linger and damage nearby enemies
details: When the summon expires or if the Skill Key is pressed again, the demons will return to you while damaging enemies

primary.name: Ghost Yaksha Lieutenant
primary.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 30, Duration: 30 sec. Summons the Ghost Yaksha Shikigami.
While summoned, the Ghost Yaksha repeatedly attacks up to 10 enemies for 200% damage 4 times.
Use the skill again while the Ghost Yaksha is summoned to instantly dismiss it, pulling in nearby enemies to be hit for 400% damage.
Cooldown: 3 sec
details: Increases %Damage and max enemies hit
Replaces <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-brother.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Brother (2nd Job)}> and can be summoned by using the same Skill Key

primary.name: Kishin Shoukan
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 20, Duration: 30 sec. Summons the demons Hana and Yuki.\nWhile summoned, the two demons ricochet an orb of energy between them to attack enemies caught in the crossfire. Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 150%, Attack Count: 2\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Summon two demons that send an orb back and forth, damaging enemies it passes through
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the amount of EXP gained from enemies
Duration can be increased by <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/nightghost-guide.png} tip={Nightghost Guide (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Mana Balance
primary.shortDesc: Uses 0% of Max HP to immediately recover 80 Mana.\nCooldown: 15 sec

primary.name: Haku Perfected
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Transformation Duration: 500 sec. Cooldown: 5 sec
Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
[Haku's Gift]: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores 80% of max HP. (Cooldown: 120 sec)
[Foxfire]: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for 55 sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire reduces the damage by 40%, then attacks back by exploding for 1350% damage. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
[Breath of the Unseen]: Kanna's final damage increased by 1% for each party member. (Always Applied)
[Haku's Blessing]: Increases damage of your party members by 10%.
details: Increases duration of buff
<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/hakus-gift.png} tip={Haku Perfected - Haku's Gift (4th Job)}> [Haku's Gift]: Increases %Max HP restored
<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/foxfire.png} tip={Haku Perfected - Foxfire (4th Job)}> [Foxfire]: Increases duration and %Damage of attack
<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/hakus-blessing.png} tip={Haku Perfected - Haku's Blessing (4th Job)}> [Haku's Blessing]: Increases amount of %Damage provided (10% -> 15%) - tooltip incorrect

primary.name: Bellflower Barrier
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 20, Duration: 100 sec, Damage: +20%, Boss Damage: +5%\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Within the barrier, party members gain %Damage and %Boss Damage
details: When a barrier is placed on top of a <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/geomancy.png} tip={Geomancy (1st Job)}> Mana Vein, the barrier will grow bigger and you will gain increased Mana recovery

primary.name: Shikigami Haunting 4
primary.shortDesc:
[1st Hit]: Damage: 250%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Attack Count: 4
[2nd Hit]: Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Attack Count: 4
[3rd Hit]: Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Attack Count: 4, Mana Restored: 5, amount needed to activate Shikigami Doppelganger additionally increased by 5.
[Spirit Warding Charm]: Activation Chance: 100%. Duration: 6 sec, Speed Reduced by 90%, Damage: 240% per sec
details: Increases %Damage and max enemies hit
Now restores some Mana on third hit and charges <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-doppelganger.png} tip={Shikigami Doppelganger (4th Job)}> if active
Increases activation chance, %Damage, and %Speed Reduced of debuff

primary.name: Shikigami Doppelganger
primary.shortDesc: When activated, begins to accumulate Mana each time Kanna consumes Mana. Once it has been charged with 260 Mana, this skill activates an attack that damages up to 8 enemies near Kanna, for 480% damage on each of 15 hits, 480 time(s).\nCooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: While toggled, after a certain amount of Mana has been consumed, release a burst of charms around you

primary.name: Nine-Tailed Fury
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 540%, Attack Count: 9, Duration: 35 sec, Damage Increase: 20%.\nCooldown: 180 sec\n[Passive Effect: When attacking while Nine-Tailed Fury is off cooldown, Haku attacks up to 6 enemies in front of him for 150% damage 3 times, at a 60% chance]
primary.desc: Unleash an explosion that damages enemies in a large area and grants a %Damage increasing buff
details: [Final Attack Passive]: When Nine-Tailed Fury is not on cooldown, Haku has a chance to attack nearby enemies

primary.name: Ghost Yaksha Boss
primary.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 40, Duration: 30 sec. Summons the Ghost Yaksha Shikigami.
While summoned, the Ghost Yaksha repeatedly attacks up to 10 enemies for 240% damage 4 times.
Use the skill again while the Ghost Yaksha is summoned to instantly dismiss it, pulling in nearby enemies to be hit for 500% damage.
Cooldown: 3 sec
details: Increases %Damage and max enemies hit
Replaces <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-lieutenant.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Lieutenant (3rd Job)}> and can be summoned by using the same Skill Key

primary.name: Kasen
primary.shortDesc: Fan Mastery: 70%, Damage: +30%

primary.name: Nightghost Guide
primary.shortDesc: Attack Chance: 30%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 160%, Attack Count: 1. Attacked Targets have a 30% chance to yield 30% additional EXP for 5 sec, and have an increased chance to drop equipment with potential. Also, when this effect is activated, the installed Kishin Shoukan's duration is increased by 5 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Kishin Shoukan Damage: +200%p, Knockback Resistance: +70%]
primary.desc: Attacks have a chance to deal an additional hit that debuffs enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance and the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/kishin-shoukan.png} tip={Kishin Shoukan (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount
[Debuff]: Enemies have a chance to yield extra EXP and a higher chance to drop equipment with Potential
When Nightghost Guide activates, the duration of <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/kishin-shoukan.png} tip={Kishin Shoukan (3rd Job)}> is increased by 5 secs

primary.name: Orochi Unbound
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 50, Max Enemies hit: 15, Damage: 375%, Attack Count: 1. Hold the key down for up to approx. 4 sec to use 5 Mana per sec. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Attack Count: 8.\nCooldown: 90 sec
primary.desc: While held, a flurry of attacks rain down on enemies
details: Can be used in the air
You have 100% Knockback Resistance while the skill is active

primary.name: Vanquisher's Charm
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 40, Max Duration: 10 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 330%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 5\nYou can move and jump while holding down the skill key.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: While held, launch charms forward that damage enemies
details: Can move and jump while attacking

primary.name: Falling Sakura
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 5\n100% of max HP recovered for yourself and nearby party members.\nCooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: A sakura tree slams down on enemies in front of you
details: If it hits an enemy, you and nearby party members recover some %HP

primary.name: Binding Tempest
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 250%, Attack Count: 8, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nDepending on the amount of damage dealt to enemies with Binding Tempest, the Stun Duration can be increased to up to 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Leap upwards and launch charms that bind enemies

primary.name: Akatsuki Warrior
primary.shortDesc: Princess Sakuno appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 5, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

hyperPassive.name: Geomancy - Spread
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Maximum number of Mana Veins that can be concurrently active increased by 1.

hyperActive.name: Circle of Suppression
hyperActive.shortDesc: When activated, uses 30 Mana to deal 500% damage to 15 nearby enemies at set intervals 1 times.\nNegates attack ignore and attack reflection effects.
hyperActive.desc: While toggled, a barrier surrounds you that damages nearby enemies
details: The shield disappears if you are idle for too long
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Veritable Pandemonium
hyperActive.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 670%, Attack Count: 15, Stun Duration: 15 sec.\nDepending on the amount of damage dealt to enemies with Veritable Pandemonium, Stun Duration increased to up to 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: A giant demon stomps on enemies and binds them

hyperActive.name: Princess's Vow
hyperActive.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 50, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%.\nOnly applies to Sengoku Warrior classes within the party.\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Summon Yuki-musume
fifthMain.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 40, Yuki-onna Duration: 50 sec. Yuki-musume assists Kanna, dealing 600% damage to 8 enemies 6-8 times. When Yuki-musume is summoned, Kanna's mana consumption is reduced by 50% and 2% HP is recovered on every attack.\nCooldown: 75 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a frozen demon that follows you and attacks nearby enemies
details: While summoned, gain reduced Mana consumption and restores %HP on every attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Spirit's Domain
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 40, Spiritstone Duration: 74 sec, the Cursed Spiritstone grows more powerful with every 120 mana absorbed from the caster, and activates additional effects per stage when boosting Cursed Spiritstone (can be boosted up to 2 times)
[Basic Effect] Deals 650% damage to up to 15 enemies within range 3 times every 3 sec. Periodically restores 4% of Max HP/MP, Final Damage +5%, Status Resistance +26
[Boost Stage 1 Additional Effect] Boosts Basic Effect by 2x, party members within range gain 1 Attack Speed, caster's Boss Damage +50%, and the mana cost of the caster's skills is reduced by 50%
[Boost Stage 2 Additional Effect] Boosts Basic Effect by 3x, party members within range gain 2 Attack Speed, caster's Boss Damage +100%, and the mana cost of the caster's skill is reduced by 100%
Cooldown: 196 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a domain that grows more powerful the more Mana is consumed
details: While active, the domain damages nearby enemies and grants a party buff within the domain that periodically restore %HP/MP and increases %Final Damage and Abnormal Status Resistance
Based on the Mana consumed, the domain can be boosted by up to 2 stages granting increased Attack Speed, and for the caster, %Boss Damage and reduced Mana costs

fifthMain.name: Liberated Spirit Circle
fifthMain.shortDesc: Mana Cost: 5, periodically summons a giant magic circle, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 295%, Number of Attacks: 15.\nThe magic circle will disappear either when it moves a certain distance or reaches the top of the map, and souls that deal 350% damage 15 times to 3 enemies will appear in up to 7 locations.\nThe giant magic circle summons souls in up to 11 locations.Cooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically when using <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-4.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm (4th Job)}> create a magic circle that moves vertically damaging enemies inside the circle
details: Every 5 Liberated Spirit Circles will create a larger circle
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Ghost Yaksha: Great Oni Lord's Legion
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 100, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: 60 sec. Open a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself.
If a 4th or below Ghost Yaksha is dismissed, sacrifice will be accumulated acccording to the amount of time the ghost was summoned. If the accumulated sacrifice reaches 60 sec+, the Great Lord can be summoned.
The Great Lord repeatedly attacks up to 15 enemies, for 900% damage, 5 time(s).
Upon re-using the skill, the portal will immediately close, and the Great Lord will perform his final attack, which attacks up to 15 enemies, for 2050% damage, 15 time(s)
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a demon that engulfs the map and attacks enemies in a large area
details: To use this skill, you need to accumulate a total of 60 secs of uptime for <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/ghost-yaksha-boss.png} tip={Ghost Yaksha Boss (4th Job)}> as a requirement to summon
At the end of the skill or when the Skill Key is pressed, the summon deals a final attack
You are invincible during initial cast and ending on skill
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/shikigami-haunting-4.png} tip={Shikigami Haunting (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Shikigami Haunting
masteryCore.shortDesc:
[1st Hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 4
[2nd Hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 4
[3rd Hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 4
[Spirit Warding Charm]: Activation Chance: 100%. Duration: 6 sec, Speed: -90%, Damage: 400% per sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/kanna/vanquishers-charm.png} tip={Vanquisher's Charm (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Vanquisher's Charm
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 40, Max Duration: 10 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 608%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 5
You can move and jump while the skill key is held.
Attacking with this skill has a 50% chance of creating additional Yosuzume.
Cooldown: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Hakumenkonmou Juubi
originSkill.shortDesc:
Mana Cost: 40, invincible during casting
Haku transforms into a legendary form, dealing 10 shockwaves that deal 2800% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times. Afterwards, grants Kanna the Hakumenkonmou Blessing buff, which lasts 10 seconds.
Every time Kanna consumes mana, Haku releases 5 shockwaves, dealing 500% damage to up 15 enemies 5 times. Increases Kanna's mana accumulation, in every mana-accumulating skill, by 50%.
(Final Blow): Activates 12 Chase Cuts that deal (5500 + Hakumenkonmou Blessing cumulative mana)% damage to up to 15 enemies within range 15 times, invincible during casting
(The mana consumed during the Hakumenkonmou Blessing buff stacks up to 500. When using the final blow, the entire stack is consumed to increase its power.)
Cooldown: 360 sec.

boostCore.name: Spirit's Domain Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Kanna's Boss Damage increases by additional 20% while receiving the effect of Spirit's Domain\n[Passive Effect - All Stats: +90]

boostCore.name: Ghost Yaksha Bosses' Boss Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Ghost Yaksha Bosses' Boss Final Damage: +60%

meta: Kanna is an INT mage class part of the Sengoku class group. Kanna also uses a different resource than MP called Mana which her skill
